message.body: Hunter you & Blake should probably just head bck home. Love Phyllis
Let me know if you get on the fllight & expected arrival. Jim wants to pick you up. Phyllis

I doubt I'll be able to get on it. The next flight to Atlanta had problems so they switched to a smaller plane and are asking people to give up tickets because there's not enough so those are getting bumped to the flight I'm on standby for
That's fine. Just let me know when you know for sure. Phyllis
It's a mad house here with 1 flight worth of people plus 30 more people trying to get to Atlanta.
You migt as well head back home. Sorry it has been such a hassel. Love you. Momm Phyllis
Let us know when you make it home. Blake is in Atlanta. Phyllis
